text: Yuxia Railway Station is in Yuxia, Huyi, Xi'an. It is a Railway Station on Xi'an-Yuxia Railway. In November 1955, it opened and started using during Chinese First five-year plan. On October 21, 2000, it stopped carrying passengers. Then it only carried goods. ==References== == Other websites == * 余下站怀旧 * http://bbs.hsw.cn/a/t729/709729.html Category:Railway stations in the People's Republic of China Category:1955 establishments in Asia
title: Yuxia Railway Station
